==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Stab:''' Performs a quick forward stab with their polearm, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack may be performed 3 times in quick succession if under the command of a [[Shogunate Infantry Captain]].
*'''Swing:''' Performs an upward swing with their polearm, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
